name: Space Rocks! (Significant Gravitas)
description:
An unforgiving and brutal space shooter.

Defend your sector of the asteroid belt from waves rival prospectors and pirates in this brutal love-letter to the classic Atari game Asteroids.  Pick daring paths between an ever changing map whilst dodging gunfire and crushing asteroids. Oh, and do try to find time to actually mine those Space Rocks!

Know when to taking daring risks, but don't expect your mistakes to be forgiven.
